snippet: The comptroller of the currency said JPMorgan Chase's trading loss would most likely influence the final version of the so-called Volcker Rule.
abstract: The comptroller of the currency said JPMorgan Chase's trading loss would most likely influence the final version of the so-called Volcker Rule.

headline.main: Regulator Concedes Oversight Lapse in JPMorgan Loss
headline.print_headline: U.S. Regulator Concedes Oversight Lapse in JPMorgan Loss
